column3: “Yup this Madzilla OG is fire!! Can't till it gets in collectives all over Hollywood!!”
“Newbie disclosure but I quite liked this with a thick warm smoke and very earthy and reminds me of hanging it in the woods of Kentucky. This is nice”
“just picked this up and it is pretty dank. I would recommend, good relaxing feeling & releaves sore muscles after a long day”
“This is a great after work strain. I highly recommend.”
